animals_header_text.text:
Responds with a picture.
You can specify a number of pictures by writing `bomb` `number` after a command. (e.g. `!cat bomb 2`)

avatar.text: Responds with your avatar, unless a username is specified

bing_setup.text: Please setup `BING_IMAGEKEY` in config.js to use the **`!image`** command.

champgg_setup.text: Please setup Champion.gg in config.js to use the **`!lol`** command.

channelinfo.text: Gives information about this channel, unless a name is specified

chat_setup.text: Please setup cleverbot in config.js to use the **`!chat`** command.

comics.text: Get a random comic from a bunch of different artists

comics_asp.text: Returns a Amazing Super Powers comic

comics_cah.text: Returns a Cyanide and Happimess comic

comics_dhd.text: Returns a Dog House Diaries comic

comics_smbc.text: Returns a Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal comic

ddg.text: Search the web, can also calculate and convert. Search other websites by appending its shortening (e.g. `!ddg !yt Hello`) See <https://duckduckgo.com/bang> for a list.

dota2_best.text: Get the top 10 Heroes for a specific position

dota2_build.text: Get the most popular build for a Hero

dota2_counters.text: Get the top 10 counters for a Hero

dota2_header_text.text:
Dota 2 help commands.
Accepted positions are #{dota_positions}.

dota2_impact.text: Get the top 10 Heroes with the biggest impact

dota2_items.text: Get the top 10 most used items for a Hero

drama.text: Responds with a drama image, if no number is written, a random one

emoji.text: Responds with an emoji copypasta, if no number is written, a random one

feedback.text: Give feedback and report bugs about the bot

feedback_reply.text: Thanks! Your feedback has been received.

feedback_setup.text: Please setup Feedback Channel in config.js to use the **`!feedback`** command.

gif.text:
Gets a gif from Giphy or Popkey matching the given tags.
Use `!giphy` or `!popkey` to search the specific sites

gif_error.text: I couldn't find a gif for

help_all.text: List all available commands in private chat

join.text: Shows a link that can be used to invite me to your server

join_link.text:
To invite me to your server, click the link below and select a server.
Only users with **Manage Server** permission in that server are able to invite me to it.
You may remove some of the permissions if you wish, but be warned it may break current and upcoming features.

lol_bans.text: Get the top 10 most common bans

lol_best.text: Get the top 10 best champs for a position

lol_counters.text: Get the top 10 counters for a Champion and Position

lol_header_text.text:
League of Legends help commands

Accepted positions are #{lol_positions}.
Accepted regions are #{lol_regions}.

lol_items.text: Get the highest win item sets for a Champion and Position

lol_match.text: Get rank, champ, winrate, and games for all players in a __current__ match.

lol_skills.text: Get the highest win skills for a Champion and Position

lol_status.text: Get the LoL Game and Client server status for all regions

meme.text: Creates a meme with the given meme name and text

meme_setup.text: Please setup Imgflip in config.js to use the **`!meme`** command.

meme_usage.text:
Usage: **`!meme`** `meme name` `"top text"` `"bottom text"`
Write **`!memelist`** for a list of meme names.

memelist.text: List of meme names for the **`!meme`** command

no_item_sets.text: I don't have item sets for

no_skills.text: I don't have skill orders for

ow_eliminations.text: Heroes with the most eliminations per life

ow_header_text.text:
Information and player stats for Overwatch
Accepted regions are #{ow_regions}.
Specifying region is optional but the request will take a second or two longer.

ow_kill_streak.text: Heroes with the highest kill streak

ow_objective_kills.text: Heroes with the most objective kills

ow_win_percent.text: Heroes with the highest win percentage

paste.text: Creates a paste on Pastebin.com and returns the url

pastebin_setup.text: Please setup Pastebin in config.js to use the **`!paste`** command.

popkey_setup.text: Please setup Popkey in config.js to use the **`!popkey`** command.

quote.text: Responds with a quote, if no number is written, a random one

random.text: Generate truly random numbers and strings

random_fraction.text: Generate a number of random real numbers between 0 and 1 with set decimal places, write **replace** at the end to disable duplicates (e.g. __!fraction 1 5 replace__)

random_gaussian.text: Generate a number of random numbers from a Gaussian distribution (e.g. __!gaussian 1 50 10 5__)

random_integer.text: Generate a number of random integers between min and max, write **replace** at the end to disable duplicates (e.g. __!integer 2 1 50 replace__)

random_setup.text: Please setup Random in config.js to use the **`!random`** commands.

random_string.text: Generate a number of random strings of a given length, can also input your own charset (default is the alphabet), as well as write **replace** at the end to disable duplicates. (e.g. __!string 1 10 abc123 replace__)

riot_setup.text: Please setup Riot's API in config.js to use the **`!lol`** command.

robohash_header_text.text:
Responds with an image according to your ID.
You can specify a suffix after a command to get a different picture. (e.g. `!robot Testie`)

roll.text: Rolls the dice a number of times with a number of sides, see **`!random`** for advanced generators

serverinfo.text: Gives information about this server, unless a name is specified

serverlist.text: Lists all the servers the bot is connected to

servers.text: Lists how many servers, channels and users the bot is connected to

set-language.text: Set all help text to respond in a specified language

specify_summoner.text: You need to specify a summoner name.

uptime.text: Shows how long the bot has been online

urban.text: Returns the summary of the first matching search result from Urban Dictionary

urban_error.text: I couldn't find a definition for

userinfo.text: Gives information about this user, unless a name is specified

version.text: Get information on the latest version of Gravebot

videocall.text: Start a one click video call or screenshare directly on Appear.in. Mention users to make it private.

wiki.text: Returns the summary of the first matching search result from Wikipedia

wiki_error.text: I couldn't find an article for

wolfram.text: Query Wolfram Alpha for almost anything

wolfram_setup.text: Please setup Wolfram in config.js to use the **`!wolfram`** command.

youtube.text: Gets a video from Youtube matching the given tags

youtube_error.text: I couldn't find a video for

youtube_setup.text: Please setup Youtube in config.js to use the **`!youtube`** command.
